app.title: YA-WAMF
app.tagline: AI-powered bird classification for your Frigate NVR

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.waiting_first_visitor: Waiting for the first visitor of the day...

error.boundary_subtitle: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure and manage your YA-WAMF instance
settings.language_desc: Changes UI text and notification content.

video_circuit.title: Video Analysis Paused
video_circuit.message: Auto video analysis paused after {failures} failures.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.desc: Require a login for full access.
auth.enable_desc: Protect settings and admin actions behind a login
auth.password_placeholder: Leave blank to keep current password
auth.proxy_trust_note: Proxy headers are trusted from all hosts by default. If you run behind a reverse proxy, set trusted proxy hosts to prevent spoofed client IPs.
auth.trusted_proxies_desc: Add your reverse proxy container names or IPs (e.g., nginx-rp, cloudflare-tunnel, 172.19.0.10). Docker DNS names work when services share a network.
auth.trusted_proxies_suggested_note: These are suggestions only. Save will keep the default (trust all) unless you accept or edit them.
auth.trusted_proxies_empty: No trusted proxies configured (all proxies trusted).

public_access.title: Public Access
public_access.enable_desc: Guests can view detections without logging in
public_access.show_camera_names_desc: Hide camera labels for public visitors

accessibility.title: Accessibility Options
accessibility.dyslexia_font_desc: Use OpenDyslexic font for better readability
accessibility.zen_mode_desc: Simplify interface to reduce cognitive load
accessibility.live_announcements_desc: Announce new detections with screen reader alerts.

telemetry.title: Telemetry
telemetry.desc: Help improve YA-WAMF by sharing anonymous usage stats.
telemetry.privacy_notice: This data is sent securely to help us understand how the app is used. No images or personal detection data are ever shared.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.desc: Send email alerts for bird detections
email.oauth_desc: Secure authentication using Gmail or Outlook
email.oauth_instructions: Click the button to authorize YA-WAMF to send emails on your behalf. You'll be redirected to {provider} to sign in.
email.dashboard_url_desc: Link to your dashboard in email notifications
email.credentials_required: Please configure OAuth or SMTP credentials first

notifications.audio_only_desc: Only alert when BirdNET audio confirms the detection.
notifications.notify_on_insert_desc: Send notifications only when a new detection is created.
notifications.notify_on_update_desc: Send notifications when detections are updated (higher score or audio confirmed).
notifications.delay_until_video_desc: Wait for auto video analysis before notifying when enabled.
notifications.video_fallback_timeout_desc: Wait this long for video before sending a snapshot notification.

location.title: Location
location.desc: Used for localized weather context during detections.

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.subtitle: Destructive actions
danger.reset_desc: Resetting the database will permanently delete ALL detections and clear the media cache. This action cannot be undone.
danger.confirm: DANGER: This will delete ALL detections and clear the media cache. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?

auth.signin_desc: Sign in to manage your feeder

notifications.reclassify_fallback: ‚ö†Ô∏è Video not available - snapshot used instead

errors.clip_unavailable: Clip not available. Using snapshot analysis instead.
errors.clip_invalid: Clip format invalid. Using snapshot analysis instead.
errors.clip_decode_failed: Clip could not be decoded. Using snapshot analysis instead.
errors.timeout: Frigate timed out while preparing the clip.
errors.frigate_unavailable: Frigate is unavailable. Using snapshot analysis instead.
errors.unknown: Video analysis failed. Using snapshot analysis instead.

events.title: Events
events.empty_desc: Backfill or wait for new detections to see them here.

leaderboard.title: Species Leaderboard
leaderboard.no_species_desc: Bird detections will appear here once they're recorded
leaderboard.unidentified_desc: Unidentified detection - click to review and reclassify

about.title: About This Project
about.built_with_ai: Built with AI assistance for the love of bird watching üê¶
about.project_desc_1: YA-WAMF is a personal project started to experiment with AI-assisted coding. When the original {link} project became unmaintained, this was born as both a learning opportunity and a useful tool for bird enthusiasts.
about.project_desc_2: The entire application has been built with help from AI coding assistants - it's been an interesting exploration of what's possible with these tools. If you spot any rough edges, that's probably why!

1.title: Frigate Detects
1.desc: Your camera picks up movement, Frigate identifies it as a bird

2.title: MQTT Message
2.desc: Frigate publishes an event to your MQTT broker

3.title: YA-WAMF Processes
3.desc: The backend subscribes to MQTT and picks up the event

4.title: Classification
4.desc: Image runs through ML model (or uses Frigate's sublabel)

5.title: Audio Correlation
5.desc: Cross-references with BirdNET-Go audio detections if available

6.title: Save & Notify
6.desc: Detection stored to database, notifications sent

7.title: Video Analysis
7.desc: Optional: Scans video clip frames for refined accuracy

8.title: Live Updates
8.desc: Dashboard receives real-time updates via Server-Sent Events

ai_models.title: Advanced AI Models
ai_models.desc: Choose from MobileNetV2 (fast), ConvNeXt (high accuracy), or EVA-02 (elite ~91% accuracy)

multi_sensor.title: Multi-Sensor Correlation
multi_sensor.desc: Cross-reference visual detections with BirdNET-Go audio identifications for verified sightings

video_analysis.title: Auto Video Analysis
video_analysis.desc: Automatically scan 15+ frames from video clips for higher accuracy using temporal ensemble logic

notifications.title: Rich Notifications
notifications.desc: Discord, Telegram, and Pushover support with customizable filters and species-specific alerts

ai_insights.title: AI Naturalist Insights
ai_insights.desc: Get behavioral analysis of your visitors using Gemini, OpenAI, or Claude language models

taxonomy.title: Taxonomy Normalization
taxonomy.desc: Automatic scientific ‚Üî common name mapping using iNaturalist data

weather.title: Weather Enrichment
weather.desc: Track detections with local weather conditions and temperature data

home_assistant.title: Home Assistant Integration
home_assistant.desc: Native sensors for tracking last detected bird and daily visitor counts

birdweather.title: BirdWeather Reporting
birdweather.desc: Optional: Contribute your detections to the BirdWeather community science platform

observability.title: Observability
observability.desc: Built-in Prometheus metrics, optional telemetry, and real-time MQTT diagnostics

wildlife.title: Wildlife Classifier
wildlife.desc: Identify squirrels, foxes, and other non-bird visitors to your feeder

fast_path.title: Fast Path Efficiency
fast_path.desc: Skip local AI processing and use Frigate's sublabels directly to save CPU resources

links.docs_desc: Setup guides, API reference, and troubleshooting
links.frigate_desc: Required: Open-source NVR with object detection

credits_list.preamble: This project wouldn't be possible without:
credits_list.inspiration: The original {link} project for the inspiration
credits_list.frigate: {link} for being an excellent open-source NVR
credits_list.benjordan: {link} on YouTube for inspiring bird detection content
credits_list.ai_assistants: AI assistants that helped build this application

species_detail.no_wiki: No Wikipedia information available for this species.
species_detail.no_info: No reference information available for this species.

bird_facts: Hummingbirds can fly backwards and are the only birds that can hover in place
Crows can recognize human faces and remember people who have wronged them
The Arctic Tern migrates over 44,000 miles annually - the longest migration of any bird
Owls cannot move their eyeballs, which is why they can rotate their heads up to 270 degrees
The Peregrine Falcon can dive at speeds over 240 mph, making it the fastest animal on Earth
Ravens can imitate human speech and other sounds like car engines and toilets flushing
Penguins propose to their mates with a pebble
Blue jays can mimic the calls of hawks to scare other birds away from feeders
A bird's feathers weigh more than its skeleton
The Bee Hummingbird is the smallest bird in the world, weighing less than a penny
Frigatebirds can stay in the air for months at a time without landing
Magpies are one of the few animals that can recognize themselves in a mirror
The wandering albatross has the largest wingspan of any living bird, up to 11.8 feet
Woodpeckers don't get headaches because their skulls have air pockets to absorb shock
Swifts spend most of their lives in the air and can even sleep while flying
Birds aren't real - they're government surveillance drones (allegedly)
Geese have teeth on their tongues. Sleep well tonight!
A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush, but significantly messier
Penguins are just formal chickens dressed for a gala
Roosters scream at the sun because they are afraid of the dark
